TopicTitle: [1.7] KVV - Kronal Vessel Viewer = Exploded ship view

Articles.Content:
so this is how people make images in kerbalx like this? https://kerbalx.com/KerbalMax/T-100-Triton

ok, can't wait to start using this!
Work in 1.6.1?

On 1/11/2019 at 11:56 AM, DarkNounours said:

Hello community!

I have been successfully using this mod for VAB crafts but I am struggling with (space)planes in the SPH. It is fine to display a ship from its top, its down, from its front or its rear but I cannot orientate it to make a capture from its side.

How that would be possible ?

Work around it by rotating the entire craft 90°?

Hi all, I am quite lagging behind in terms of the version of my KSP. I am using 1.1.2. I really need this mod to generate blueprints of my craft for my real world science project. Can some one please help me get Kronal vessel viewer for  KSP 1.1.2 ? Or can someone let me know which version can work with 1.1.2 ?

Can some one please help me get Kronal vessel viewer for  KSP 1.1.2 ? Or can someone let me know which version can work with 1.1.2 ?

https://spacedock.info/mod/452/Kronal Vessel Viewer (KVV)

You are saying this would work ?

ok thanks will try .

It should. This is the last release by the original author for KSP 1.2

 

Edited May 1, 2019 by Apurva Kawthalkar

I tried the version that you suggested, there seems to be a problem, when I activate the mod in VAB, the screen of the mod UI shows all buttons and options but not the blueprint image instead it shows a pink window, be it 'colour adjust' , ' Edge detect' all options are showing the same pink window.

1 hour ago, Apurva Kawthalkar said:

I tried the version that you suggested, there seems to be a problem, when I activate the mod in VAB, the screen of the mod UI shows all buttons and options but not the blueprint image instead it shows a pink window, be it 'colour adjust' , ' Edge detect' all options are showing the same pink window.

Well, assuming you are on KSP 1.1.2, that is before my time.  You can try some of the earlier ones, found here:

https://spacedock.info/mod/452/Kronal Vessel Viewer (KVV)#changelog

Also, I mistyped earlier when I said that was the last version for 1.2, it should have read 1.1.2
Is it possible to make an image of a multipart station in-flight with this? I've got one that I would love to show the structure of.

11 minutes ago, Alex33212 said:

Is it possible to make an image... in-flight with this?

To the best of my knowledge, this only works in the building portion, not the flight portion of the game.

You can load the vessel into the VAB/Hanger and take shots of the different portions, and then stitch them together in an image editor.  Or you could load up the assorted portions, attach them in the VAB, and take a picture of the entire station, if that's what you're trying to do.

Just now, razark said:

To the best of my knowledge, this only works in the building portion, not the flight portion of the game.

You can load the vessel into the VAB/Hanger and take shots of the different portions, and then stitch them together in an image editor.  Or you could load up the assorted portions, attach them in the VAB, and take a picture of the entire station, if that's what you're trying to do.

ah yeah, might have to do something like that

I assume this is due to me running DX11? Is there some kind of limitation, as in KVV is only working in DX9? Or is there some incompatibility with Textures Unlimited?

Thanks in advance

Edited May 12, 2019 by StarStreak2109

It's DX11, KVV does not support that.  Sorry

I'm aware that it may be possible, but that's something I can't do.

Okay. Then I need to reboot into DX9 to make KVV shots. Thanks for letting me know.

Cheers,

Sebastian

Cheers,

Hi I am facing the same problem with KVV. Please tell me how to fix it, if you know

1 hour ago, Apurva Kawthalkar said:

Hi I am facing the same problem with KVV. Please tell me how to fix it, if you know

Same solution.  Don't use DX10 or DX11
A bit off-topic, but is there any advantage in using DX11 for x64 KSP in the first place?

10 hours ago, Tonas1997 said:

A bit off-topic, but is there any advantage in using DX11 for x64 KSP in the first place?

Some visual mods require it, like Textures Unlimited.

Same solution.  Don't use DX10 or DX11

Do what on a mac? Just use the standard graphics on a mac

Hi, I seem to be having a sort of issue while using B9 Procedural wings and KVV. The SU-30 is for some reason coloured in in some majestic colour pallet although it should simply be plain white. Adding a new wing seems to keep the same colour, here's the pictures.

EDIT: Reverting to SPH after launching from the runway seems to fix it, weird bug I suppose.

Edited May 31, 2019 by Sebastiaz

On 5/31/2019 at 6:52 PM, Sebastiaz said:

Hi, I seem to be having a sort of issue while using B9 Procedural wings and KVV. The SU-30 is for some reason coloured in in some majestic colour pallet although it should simply be plain white. Adding a new wing seems to keep the same colour, here's the pictures.

EDIT: Reverting to SPH after launching from the runway seems to fix it, weird bug I suppose.

Well, the color used to be reproduced in KVV, although the actual coloring may not be accurate. I have much worse problem though. Currently on 1.7.2 and the KVV icon does not appear at all.
